title.rendered: Screen Sizes For Different Samsung Handsets

content.rendered:
We all use our smartphones to do a range of different things. Whether that’s streaming Netflix late at night, snapping beautiful pictures whilst on holiday, gaming and everything in between. But the one thing we need to enjoy all these activities to our best ability is a great screen of course. If you’re a loyal Samsung user you’re in luck! Fonehouse is here to give you a lineup of the screen sizes of some of the best Samsung handsets on the market. Selecting your dream screen size made easy. 

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G 

The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G screen is a whopping 6.8 inches. This large Dynamic AMOLED 2X display has a 90% screen-to-body ratio and is great at making visuals more immersive than ever – a cinema-like experience in the palm of your hand. This size is combined with a 1440 x 3080 resolution to support activities like gaming, social media scrolling and TV-show watching even further. This is a display that never falls flat. 

Samsung Galaxy S22 5G

The Samsung Galaxy S22 5G has a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and features an 88.6% screen-to-body ratio. This ratio makes the screen appear larger and is perfect for indulging in content that requires a bigger screen – making work video calls or jotting down notes for example. This display is also super durable thanks to its Corning Gorilla Glass material. 

Samsung Galaxy A53 5G 

The Samsung Galaxy A53 5G has a large 6.5-inch FHD+ screen paired with a 1080 x 2400 resolution. Smooth, seamless and vibrant are three words to describe this display. A fingerprint sensor for speedy access to your device is also included. Lagging visuals won’t be an issue either thanks to this handset’s 120Hz refresh rate. 

Samsung Galaxy S21 5G

Released in 2021, this Samsung Galaxy S21 5G model features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a 1080 x 2400 pixel resolution. A Reduced edged bezel design on the display is also featured which creates an immersive experience. With this handset, brighter, bolder and more vivid visuals are a guarantee. 

Samsung Galaxy A13 

The Samsung Galaxy A13 has a huge 6.6-inch gorilla glass display with a 1080 x 2408 pixel resolution – just the specs you need for spectacular visuals and high durability. If that wasn’t impressive enough, this handset is also super affordable with prices ranging from as little as £13/mo. 

After reading all the ins and outs about the different screen sizes the world of Samsung have to offer, I’m sure you’re eager to get your hands on a handset of your own. Well lucky for you we at Fonehouse sell all the Samsung handsets mentioned above and even more! Want to protect your new display with a durable screen protector and case too? Well, check out our mobile accessories range! We’ve got everything you need for your new smartphone in one place.
